summary.span: 命名空间包含管理远程对象生存期的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that manage the lifetime of remote objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传统上，分布式垃圾回收使用引用计数和 ping 来控制对象的生存期。Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control over the lifetime of objects. 如果每个服务都有几个客户端，则这种方法很有效，但当每个服务有数千个客户端时，这种情况并不This works well when there are a few clients per service, but doesn't scale well when there are thousands of clients per service. 远程处理生存期服务将租约与每个服务相关联，并在其租约时间到期时删除服务。The remoting lifetime service associates a lease with each service, and deletes a service when its lease time expires. 生存期服务可以采用传统的分布式垃圾回收器的功能，并且在每个服务器的客户端数增加时，它也可以很好地进行调整。The lifetime service can take on the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and it also adjusts well when the numbers of clients per server increases. 每个应用程序域包含负责在其域中控制租约的租约管理器。Each application domain contains a lease manager that is responsible for controlling leases in its domain. 定期检查所有租约的过期租约时间。All leases are examined periodically for expired lease times. 如果租约过期，则会调用一个或多个租约的主办方，并为其提供续订租约的机会。If a lease has expired, one or more of the lease's sponsors are invoked and given the opportunity to renew the lease. 如果所有主办方都不决定续订租约，则租约管理器会删除租约，并且垃圾回收器可以收集该对象。If none of the sponsors decides to renew the lease, the lease manager removes the lease and the object can be collected by the garbage collector. 租约管理器维护租约列表，租约按剩余租约时间排序。The lease manager maintains a lease list with leases sorted by remaining lease time. 剩余时间最短的租约存储在列表顶部。The leases with the shortest remaining time are stored at the top of the list.
